sexAction.applyEffects: #IF(sex.getCurrentSexPreference(npc, pc).getTargetedSexArea()==ORIFICE_MOUTH) [##sex.changePositions(SEX_POSITION_OVER_DESK, sex.positionData(pc, SEX_SLOT_OVER_DESK_OVER_DESK_ON_FRONT), sex.positionData(npc, SEX_SLOT_OVER_DESK_RECEIVING_ORAL))] #ELSE [##sex.changePositions(SEX_POSITION_OVER_DESK, sex.positionData(pc, SEX_SLOT_OVER_DESK_OVER_DESK_ON_FRONT), sex.positionData(npc, SEX_SLOT_OVER_DESK_BETWEEN_LEGS))] #ENDIF
sexAction.title: Swap end
sexAction.tooltip: Move around to the other end of your partner.

description.text: #IF(sex.getCurrentSexPreference(npc, pc).getTargetedSexArea()==ORIFICE_MOUTH) Having had enough of fucking you, [npc.name] slides [npc.her] [npc.cock+] free, before swiftly moving around to the other end of the bondage bench and slapping [npc.her] [npc.cock+] against your [pc.face+]. #ELSE Having had enough of fucking your face, [npc.name] slides [npc.her] [npc.cock+] out of your mouth, before swiftly moving around to the other end of the bondage bench and slapping [npc.her] [npc.cock+] against your #IF(sex.getCurrentSexPreference(npc, pc).getTargetedSexArea()==ORIFICE_VAGINA) [pc.pussy+]. #ELSE [pc.asshole+]. #ENDIF #ENDIF
